comments: Eh, mostly a waste of time. I suppose some people might like to just sit there and listen to his stories, but I\'d rather learn something useful. I can\'t say that I\'ve ever walked out of class thinking that I\'d actually picked up something that I could use in my future profession.

He was very nice and always helpful if I asked. He encouraged a lot of discussion in his class. My favorite part of his class was all of the real life experiences from his years teaching that he would use as examples.
Very willing to listen and adjust teaching. Many inclusion classes are repitive. 1st semester here he worked on fixing that. Great guy, down to earth, easy to chat with.
